GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Fix premature hw access after PCI error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 6c125fd5ad035777f7b471553f7ddda76e8e7136. For more details please see the references link.
